entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
